segments.text: Our housing problem is a highly complicated issue .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is true . I think we should change some policies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Like our LPF program . The mortgage size is linked with the amount of savings households have accumulated on their LPF accounts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Indeed , it's unfair . Households with higher salaries receive larger LPF contributions and thus qualify for larger loans . Lower-income households , on the other hand , can only get smaller loans , or perhaps nothing if they could not afford to purchase any housing .
segments.speaker: S2
